products.title: Delicious Grey (6510)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Delicious Grey (6510) Velux Roman Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Roman Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Explore the infinite potential of beautiful fabrics and be inspired by the soft styling effects that make this collection refined and original. And due to the Roman blind's specific design, you can easily change the fabric in a matter of minutes. Just pick your choice!

 	Elegant and decorative with soft lighting effects.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Interchangeable fabrics.
 	Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning.
 	No visible cords ensures child safety.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.title: Light Grey (1705) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Light Grey (1705) (Blackout) Velux Blackout Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Blackout Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.title: Grey (1158)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Grey (1158) Velux Energy Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Energy Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy.

 	Blackout effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Improved insulation.
 	Sleek design - no visible cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	12 colour choices.

products.title: Brushed Silver (7057)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Brushed Silver (7057) Velux Venetian Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Venetian Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Low maintenance, moisture resistant Venetian blinds are perfect for bathrooms and kitchens. Their unique cordless design eliminates unsightly hanging cords and allows you to easily tilt the slats in any direction for optimum light adjustment.

 	Perfect for high humidity rooms.
 	Easy to clean.
 	Optimum light adjustment.
 	Preserves your view whole providing privacy.
 	No hanging cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	9 colour choices.

products.productdescription:
The Velux pleated blind is an elegant way to provide privacy while bathing your room in a pleasant , soft light. It can be positioned anywhere in the roof window to adjust the amount of incoming light an you can still enjoy a view of he outside.

products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Light Grey & White (1705 & 1016) Velux Duo Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Duo Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux duo blackout blind is a blackout blind and a pleated blind in one. It offers the best of both worlds, blackout at anytime and softly diffused natural light all day. It is available in all blackout blind colours in combination with a white pleated blind.

products.title: Skye Flint Grey (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Skye Flint Grey (Blackout) Blinds for Keylite Windows from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Blinds for Keylite Windows online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window.  Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit Velux, Rooflite, Keylite, Fakro and Dakstra roof windows.  Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels.

All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.
